schema.title: Create a React Hook for Nx
schema.description: Create a React component using Hooks in a dedicated React project.

examples.description: Generate a hook `my-hook` in the `mylib` library

path.description: The file path to the hook without the file extension (e.g. `my-app/src/app/my-hook/use-my-hook` generates the file `my-app/src/app/my-hook/use-my-hook.ts`). Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the hook file path?

name.description: The hook symbol name. It not provided, it defaults to the last segment of the provided `path`.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create `spec.ts` test files for the new hook.

export.description: When true, the hook is exported from the project `index.ts` (if it exists).
export.x-prompt: Should this hook be exported in the project?
